  • Classes in org.neo4j.kernel.internal.locker used by org.neo4j.kernel.internal.locker 
    Class Description
    FileLockerService
    Service to provide DBMS and individual databases file lockers
    FileLockException
    Signals a failure to lock the dbms or database lock file
    GlobalFileLocker
    File locker that guarantee that only single channel ever will be opened and then closed file to prevent cases where lock will be released when any of the opened channels for file will be released as described in FileLock javadoc:
    Locker
    The class takes a lock on provided file.
